attributes.action: Abolish the new Under 25 System for Off Licences and Shops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have just noticed in my local off-licence a poster saying anyone who looks under 25 will be asked for ID for age-restricted products. This is ridiculous. This means I a 22 year old will have to produce ID. This stupid system should be abolished. It is not only young who binge drink
